sentences.sContent: He wants to hike round the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: He wants to hike round the world.
sentences.sCn: 他打算徒步旅行环游世界一周。

sentences.sContent: You can organize a picnic in the park, a group hike or bike ride, or meet up with friends for one of those free local events.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can organize a picnic in the park, a group hike or bike ride, or meet up with friends for one of those free local events.
sentences.sCn: 你可以组织在公园野餐一群徒步旅行或者骑自行车或者和朋友会面为其中的一个免费本地事件。

phrases.pCn: 走路；滚开；哪凉快那歇着去

trans.tranOther: to take a long walk in the mountains or countryside
a long walk in the mountains or countryside
to increase a price, tax etc by a large amount
